feeds.description: Covers Kubernetes trends, tutorials, and expert opinions within the larger context of DevOps.

feeds.name: The New Stack Kubernetes
feeds.description: Deep dives into Kubernetes trends, including adoption stories and technical breakdowns.

feeds.name: Kubernetes Podcast by Google
feeds.description: Weekly discussions on Kubernetes news, interviews with industry leaders, and updates from Google’s Kubernetes team.

feeds.name: KubeWeekly by CNCF
feeds.description: A roundup of the most relevant Kubernetes-related news, blogs, and resources.

feeds.name: Red Hat Kubernetes Blog
feeds.description: Kubernetes content from Red Hat, focusing on OpenShift and enterprise-grade solutions.

feeds.name: Collabnix Blog
feeds.description: Insights on Docker, Kubernetes, Cloud-Native and IoT.

feeds.name: Sysdig Kubernetes Blog
feeds.description: Offers security and monitoring insights for Kubernetes environments.

feeds.description: Kubernetes content tailored to VMware’s Tanzu portfolio.

feeds.name: GitLab Kubernetes Blog

feeds.name: DigitalOcean Kubernetes Content
feeds.description: Guides and use cases for Kubernetes on DigitalOcean.

feeds.name: Rancher Labs Blog
feeds.description: Kubernetes tips and tricks for Rancher’s multi-cluster platform.

feeds.name: Mirantis Blog

feeds.name: HashiCorp Kubernetes Blog

feeds.name: Helm Blog

feeds.description: A community-driven feed with solutions to Kubernetes problems.
